ygData.subject: RE: Lute of the Gypsy Princess and other lutes.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... First, it s not seemingly - it *is* limitless mana.  A guide friend of mine confirmed that one... And a few additions to your list: Can cast while moving,
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:32 AM 11/23/99 -0600, you wrote:
>From: silky@...
>
>
>Is it just me - or are some of the things NPCs allowed to do that we can't
>just really out of wack?
>
>Seemingly endless manna
>Seemingly limitless casting range
>Able to affect folks WELL outside normal range limits
>Able to have multiple pets
>
>Lets see - anything I've forgotten?

First, it's not seemingly - it *is* limitless mana. A guide friend of mine
confirmed that one...
And a few additions to your list:
Can cast while moving, Can open locked doors, can see through walls, can
attack from the bottom of the ocean, don't drown - ever, can chase you even
when blinded....

And the list goes on....

Talies
